Title: cURL: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cURL, the worst of
    which could lead to man-in-the-middle attacks.

Background.Text: cURL is a command line tool for transferring files with URL syntax, supporting numerous protocols.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cURL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could cause a man-in-the-middle attack via a crafted certificate issued by a legitimate certification authority. Furthermore, a context-dependent attacker may be able to bypass security restrictions by connecting as other users.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All cURL users should upgrade to the latest version:
